channel.title: Introduction to Neural Networks on Social Data Science 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction to Neural Networks on Social Data Science 2021

item.title: Introduction Neural Networks
item.description: Use the tabs to access content. Theory part is general, R & Python application part language specific. This session introduces to artificial neural networks (ANN) and Deep Learning (DL) Suggested Datacamp courses Introduction to TensorFlow in R Introduction to Deep Learning in Python Theory: Neural Networks and Deep Learning R Application - Neural Networks Python Application - Neural Networks Video 1: Introduction and history of ANNs Video 2: Building blocks and architecture of ANNs Video 3: Learning in ANNs Slides Use arrows keys on keyboard to navigate.
